## Visual App Builder

Build sophisticated web applications using our drag-and-drop visual builder powered by 60+ enterprise-grade components. From simple forms to complex dashboards, create production-ready interfaces without writing a single line of code.

### Key Capabilities

- Drag-and-drop interface with real-time preview
- 60+ pre-built enterprise components (tables, forms, charts, calendars)
- Responsive design with mobile, tablet, and desktop breakpoints
- Custom CSS and styling control
- Component state management and event handling
- Theme customization and white-labeling
- Version control and rollback capabilities
- Export to React code for further customization
60+Components100+Templates<100msLoad Time
## Mobile Development

Build native iOS and Android applications from a single codebase using React Native and Expo. Deploy to app stores with automatic code signing, push notifications, and OTA updates built-in.

### Key Capabilities

- Single codebase for iOS and Android
- Native performance with React Native
- Expo integration for rapid development
- Push notification support
- Over-the-air (OTA) updates
- Offline-first architecture with local storage
- Camera, GPS, and device sensors access
- App store deployment automation

Security & Compliance - AlgorithmShift | AlgorithmShift
# Security and compliance.

Enterprise-grade security and compliance built into every layer of our platform. Your data is protected with industry-leading standards and certifications.

## Certifications & Compliance

We are actively pursuing the highest standards of security and compliance
In Progress
### SOC 2 Type 2

Audited controls for security, availability, and confidentiality
In Progress
### ISO 27001

International standard for information security management
In Progress
### GDPR

European data protection and privacy regulation
In Progress
### PIPEDA

Canadian privacy law for personal information

## Security Features

Comprehensive security measures to protect your data and applications

### Data Encryption

End-to-end encryption for data in transit (TLS 1.3) and at rest (AES-256)

### Access Controls

Role-based access control (RBAC) and multi-factor authentication (MFA)

### Security Monitoring

24/7 security monitoring and intrusion detection systems

### Regular Audits

Third-party security audits and penetration testing

### Data Backup

Automated daily backups with point-in-time recovery

### Infrastructure Security

Enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure with 99.9% uptime SLA

## Data Protection

Complete control and transparency over your data

### Data Residency

Choose where your data is stored to meet regional compliance requirements

### Data Isolation

Complete tenant isolation ensures your data remains separate and secure

### Data Portability

Export your data anytime in standard formats

### Data Retention

Configurable retention policies and secure data deletion

## Infrastructure Security

Built on enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure
99.9%Uptime SLA24/7Security Monitoring<15minIncident Response
### Hosted on AWS & Google Cloud

Our infrastructure is hosted on leading cloud providers with built-in redundancy, DDoS protection, and automatic failover capabilities. Data centers are distributed globally for optimal performance and compliance.
Auto-scalingLoad BalancingDDoS ProtectionMulti-region
## Security Best Practices

Our commitment to security goes beyond compliance
Regular security training for all employeesCode reviews and automated security scanningVulnerability disclosure program and bug bountiesAnnual third-party penetration testingIncident response plan with 24/7 on-call teamRegular security updates and patch managementSecure software development lifecycle (SSDLC)Background checks for all team members
## Questions About Security?

Our security team is here to help. Contact us for detailed security documentation, compliance reports, or to discuss your specific requirements.
Contact Security TeamView Security Docs
